headline: Axon Enterprise, Inc. (AXON): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Axon Enterprise, Inc. on Compounding Your Wealth’s Substack by Sergey. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AXON. Axon Enterprise, Inc.’s share was trading at $708.84 as of September 26th. AXON’s trailing and forward P/E were 174.59 and 83.33, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Axon Enterprise is […]
